data.description:
Idol Enhancement Month
〜Twinkling of the Stars〜
When you acquire the target P idol
Unlocks after the Bond Boost Campaign ends
Formations can be set individually for each Produce. If you set a formation for one Produce, it will not apply to others.
You can now obtain Star Sparkles as a Produce reward
An item obtainable in "Kunio Juo's Idol Intensive Month 〜Twinkling of the Stars〜" Can be used in the event gacha.
Because the guideline is set to “Relaxed”, the effect to change it to “Preservation” will not activate.
The Produce data in progress has been discarded.

Do you want to delete the saved local data?

■ Important Notes (Please read carefully)
Deleting local data will not remove your user data, but it will erase any suspended gameplay data and some saved states.
